languages.text: {n}Мудрые слуги Омниссии подвергли строгому дознанию "неправильных" заключенных. Исследование мозговых тканей не выявило мутаций, и утративших полезность работников было разрешено сервиторизировать, чтобы сохранить уровень выработки. Но кое-что было обнаружено.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мудрые слуги Омниссии подвергли строгому дознанию "неправильных" заключенных. Исследование мозговых тканей не выявило мутаций, и утративших полезность работников было разрешено сервиторизировать, чтобы сохранить уровень выработки. Но кое-что было обнаружено.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah have interrogated the 'strange' prisoners. The research of their brain tissue had not found any mutations, and the labourers who have lost their utility have been allowed to convert into servitors to maintain the level of production. But something has been found, after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah have interrogated the 'strange' prisoners. The research of their brain tissue had not found any mutations, and the labourers who have lost their utility have been allowed to convert into servitors to maintain the level of production. But something has been found, after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah have interrogated the "strange" prisoners. Research on their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who have completely lost their utility have been granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. But it seems, in the end, something was found, after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah have interrogated the "strange" prisoners. Research on their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who have completely lost their utility have been granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. But it seems, in the end, something was found, after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

{n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}欧姆尼塞亚的聪敏仆人审问了这些古怪的囚犯。调查表明，他们的脑组织并没有发生任何突变。为了维持生产水平，那些已经彻底无法工作的奴隶被改造成了机仆。不过，到了最后，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人还是发现了某些情况。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}欧姆尼塞亚的聪敏仆人审问了这些古怪的囚犯。调查表明，他们的脑组织并没有发生任何突变。为了维持生产水平，那些已经彻底无法工作的奴隶被改造成了机仆。不过，到了最后，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人还是发现了某些情况。{/n}
{n}欧姆尼塞亚的聪敏仆人审问了这些古怪的囚犯。研究表明，他们的脑组织并没有发生任何突然。为了维持生产水平，那些已经彻底无法工作的奴隶被改造成了机仆。不过到最后，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人还是发现了某些情况。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los sabios servidores del Omnissiah interrogaron a los extraños prisioneros. El análisis de su tejido cerebral no reveló ninguna mutación. A los trabajadores que perdieron completamente su utilidad se les concedió la servidorización para mantener los niveles de producción. No obstante, al final se hizo un descubrimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los sabios servidores del Omnissiah interrogaron a los extraños prisioneros. El análisis de su tejido cerebral no reveló ninguna mutación. A los trabajadores que perdieron completamente su utilidad se les concedió la servidorización para mantener los niveles de producción. No obstante, al final se hizo un descubrimiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}万機神の賢い従者らは、'奇妙な'囚人たちを尋問した。彼らの脳組織を調べても、突然変異は見つからなかった。有用性が完全に失われたそれらの労働者たちは、生産レベルを維持するため、従者になることが認められている。しかし、最終的には、何かが見つかったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}万機神の賢い従者らは、'奇妙な'囚人たちを尋問した。彼らの脳組織を調べても、突然変異は見つからなかった。有用性が完全に失われたそれらの労働者たちは、生産レベルを維持するため、従者になることが認められている。しかし、最終的には、何かが見つかったようだ。{/n}
{n}万機神の賢い従者らは、'奇妙な'囚人たちを尋問した。彼らの脳組織を調べても、突然変異は見つからなかった。有用性が完全に失われたそれらの労働者たちは、生産レベルを維持するため、従者になることが認められている。しかし、最終的には、何かが見つかったようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les sages serviteurs de l'Omnimessie interrogent les détenus « étranges ». L'examen de leurs tissus cérébraux ne révèle aucune mutation... Les ouvriers ayant totalement perdu toute utilité font l'objet d'une servitorisation afin de maintenir les niveaux de production, mais finalement, quelque chose est découvert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sages serviteurs de l'Omnimessie interrogent les détenus « étranges ». L'examen de leurs tissus cérébraux ne révèle aucune mutation... Les ouvriers ayant totalement perdu toute utilité font l'objet d'une servitorisation afin de maintenir les niveaux de production, mais finalement, quelque chose est découvert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die weisen Diener des Omnissiah haben die merkwürdigen Gefangenen verhört. Bei der Untersuchung ihres Gehirngewebes wurden keine Mutationen festgestellt. Den Arbeitern, die ihren Nutzen vollständig verloren hatten, wurde die Servitorisierung gewährt, um die Produktionsquoten aufrechtzuerhalten. Eine Entdeckung war allerdings erwähnenswert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die weisen Diener des Omnissiah haben die merkwürdigen Gefangenen verhört. Bei der Untersuchung ihres Gehirngewebes wurden keine Mutationen festgestellt. Den Arbeitern, die ihren Nutzen vollständig verloren hatten, wurde die Servitorisierung gewährt, um die Produktionsquoten aufrechtzuerhalten. Eine Entdeckung war allerdings erwähnenswert.{/n}

{n}Die weisen Diener des Omnissiah haben die 'merkwürdigen' Gefangenen verhört. Bei der Untersuchung ihres Gehirngewebes wurden keine Mutationen festgestellt. Den Arbeitern, die ihre Nützlichkeit vollständig eingebüßt hatten, wurde die Servitorisierung gewährt, um die Produktionsquoten aufrechtzuerhalten. Es scheint jedoch, als wäre letztlich doch noch etwas gefunden worden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hermesih'in bilge hizmetkârları, tuhaf hükümlüleri sorguladı. Beyin dokularında yaptıkları incelemeler sonucunda bir mutasyon gözlemlenmedi. İşlevlerini tümüyle yitiren işçiler ise üretim oranlarının düşmemesi adına hizmetörleştirildi. Ancak neticede bir keşif yapılmış oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wise servants of the Omnissiah interrogated the strange prisoners. The examination of their brain tissue did not reveal any mutations. Those labourers who had completely lost their utility were granted servitorisation in order to maintain production levels. However, one discovery was made after all.{/n}
